(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP
        (NP (DT all))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBP have)
              (VP (VBN written)
                (PRT (RP in))
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB join)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN competition)))))))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
prep(Thanks-1, to-2)
pobj(to-2, all-3)
nsubj(written-6, who-4)
aux(written-6, have-5)
rcmod(all-3, written-6)
prt(written-6, in-7)
aux(join-9, to-8)
xcomp(written-6, join-9)
det(competition-11, the-10)
dobj(join-9, competition-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (ADVP (DT all))
    (VP (VBD wrote)
      (ADVP (RB very) (RB well)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(wrote-3, You-1)
advmod(wrote-3, all-2)
root(ROOT-0, wrote-3)
advmod(well-5, very-4)
advmod(wrote-3, well-5)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC but)
    (SBAR (IN as)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP know)
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (EX there))
              (VP (MD can)
                (ADVP (RB only))
                (VP (VB be)
                  (NP (CD one) (JJ winning) (NN entry)))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(know-4, but-1)
mark(know-4, as-2)
nsubj(know-4, you-3)
root(ROOT-0, know-4)
expl(entry-11, there-5)
aux(entry-11, can-6)
advmod(entry-11, only-7)
cop(entry-11, be-8)
num(entry-11, one-9)
amod(entry-11, winning-10)
ccomp(know-4, entry-11)


(ROOT
  (X (CC But)
    (S
      (VP (VB do)
        (S
          (NP (RB n't))
          (VP (VB be)
            (VP (VBN disheartened)))
          (, ,))))))


cc(do-2, But-1)
root(ROOT-0, do-2)
nsubjpass(disheartened-5, n't-3)
auxpass(disheartened-5, be-4)
ccomp(do-2, disheartened-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP hope)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB run)
              (NP (JJR more) (JJ similar) (NNS competitions))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (DT the) (NN future))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(hope-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, hope-2)
mark(run-6, that-3)
nsubj(run-6, we-4)
aux(run-6, can-5)
ccomp(hope-2, run-6)
amod(competitions-9, more-7)
amod(competitions-9, similar-8)
dobj(run-6, competitions-9)
prep(run-6, in-10)
det(future-12, the-11)
pobj(in-10, future-12)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP
      (ADVP (RB So))
      (IN without)
      (NP (JJ further) (NN ado)))
    (, ,)))


advmod(without-2, So-1)
root(ROOT-0, without-2)
amod(ado-4, further-3)
pobj(without-2, ado-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (JJ happy)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB announce)
              (SBAR (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (CD 2) (NNS people))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WP who))
                      (S
                        (VP (MD will)
                          (VP (VB be)
                            (VP (VBG attending)
                              (S
                                (NP (DT the) (NNP Gourmet) (NNP Culinary) (NNP Course))
                                (NP (DT this) (NNP Friday)
                                  (CC and)
                                  (NNP Saturday)))))))))
                  (VP (VBP are)))))))))
    (: :)))


nsubj(happy-3, I-1)
cop(happy-3, am-2)
root(ROOT-0, happy-3)
aux(announce-5, to-4)
xcomp(happy-3, announce-5)
mark(are-22, that-6)
det(people-9, the-7)
num(people-9, 2-8)
nsubj(are-22, people-9)
nsubj(attending-13, who-10)
aux(attending-13, will-11)
aux(attending-13, be-12)
rcmod(people-9, attending-13)
det(Course-17, the-14)
nn(Course-17, Gourmet-15)
nn(Course-17, Culinary-16)
nsubj(Friday-19, Course-17)
det(Friday-19, this-18)
xcomp(attending-13, Friday-19)
cc(Friday-19, and-20)
conj(Friday-19, Saturday-21)
ccomp(announce-5, are-22)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNS Congrats) (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Congrats-1)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC And)
    (VP (VB make)
      (S
        (ADJP (JJ sure)
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (VB invite)
                (NP (PRP us))
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (PRP$ your) (NN home))))))))
      (ADVP (RB later)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB try)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ newfound) (NNS skills)))))))
    (. !)))


cc(make-2, And-1)
root(ROOT-0, make-2)
acomp(make-2, sure-3)
nsubj(invite-5, you-4)
ccomp(sure-3, invite-5)
dobj(invite-5, us-6)
prep(invite-5, to-7)
poss(home-9, your-8)
pobj(to-7, home-9)
advmod(make-2, later-10)
aux(try-12, to-11)
dep(later-10, try-12)
poss(skills-15, your-13)
amod(skills-15, newfound-14)
dobj(try-12, skills-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT Some) (NN stuff))
    (VP (TO to)
      (VP (VB note)))
    (: :)))


det(stuff-2, Some-1)
nsubj(note-4, stuff-2)
aux(note-4, to-3)
root(ROOT-0, note-4)
